title: Hokenshitsu no Sagara Sensei
description:
Sagara was a nurse in typical High School. She looks like a cool beauty type person but inside she's always horny. The MC Mitani is keep randomly fainting at school. So from time to time, he's brought to the infirmary. One day Sagara Sensei was not in menstruation but she still felt horny. So, she took advantage of Mitani who had fainted in the infirmary to relieve her lust. What's gonna happen to him? Another story of a lucky guy.
